name: Pi-Run
description:
Game Description

This game is an endless run game developed using Unity. This game is purposed to elementary student to learn basic arithmetic through game. The player in this game is represented by student who bring pencil to answer each question from teacher. The player need to answer the question from provided choices.

How to play
  1. Player must get through the obstacle by jumping from one platform to another. Player can jump using "space button" in keyboard.
  2. In the same time, player must answer each question from provided choices. Player must press the answer from 1 to 9 from the provided in-screen button. 
  3. Player must avoid joystick and smartphone objects by jumping those objects. 
  4. Player's scores will increases in each correct answer.
  5. Player's health icon will decrease by one in each late answer (the teacher hit the student) or by hitting joystick and smartphone object.
